summary: My first ENB. Realistic Perfor ENB
descriptionHtml:
That’s my first ever ENB, it is performance friendly.

But also it is meant to be high quality.

There is no required weather plugin or lightning mod. Feel free to use the ones you like most.

INSTALATION :

 1 Download my ENB files and copy them to main skyrim folder
 
2 Download latest enb  from here  http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html[left][ You can use the newest version or the older Version but i like the Parallax Effekt. Im using the  v0.279 is the best![/left]
 
3 Copy  "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" to your main skyrim folder


[b][i][size=4]
[/size][/i][/b]Go to the skyrimprefs.ini and be sure that under [Display] section:

fGamma=1.0000
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

Optional:

Download my Skyrim Prefs ini and Skyrim ini.

If this copies in your Skyrim folder where to itself also the saving folder considers. The path: User / Own documents / My Games/ Skyrim and shifts this here there.

Before, however, you this make a backup copy makes yours original Inis!!!

If her burglaries FPS agree sets in the Skyrim ini [Grass] and puts iMinGrassSize=45 on standard 75. The lower the greater the grass density.

[u]Recommended !?

[/u]No Everybody likes his Skyrim differently so if I also liked to give the freedom to everybody as to leave his Skyrim as he would want it himself!



My Personal Mods:

 Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - LITE  [b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?

[/b]Enhanced Lights and FX   [b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?
[/b]
Vividian ENB - Weather and Lighting  [b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36067/?


My Skyrim is extreme moddet all that would last hours which are mods in use these abovementioned ones
my lighting effects Mods are they an even better feeling give.

I hope you have fun with this ENB. If still what should be so writes up me or visits me simply sometimes on Twitch; http://www.twitch.tv/stond3r


Sorry for my bad English im a German Peacemaker :)
[/b]
author: sToNd3r
